<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	If the Lender makes, or intends to make, a claim under paragraph (d) above, it shall promptly notify the Company of the FATCA Deduction which will give, or has given, rise to the claim.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	12.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	INCREASED COSTS
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	12.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Increased Costs
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Except as provided below in this Clause 12, the Company must, within
	five Business Days of demand, pay to the Lender the amount of any Increased Cost incurred by the Lender or any of its Affiliates as a result of:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the introduction of, or any change in, or any change in the interpretation, administration or application of, any Law or Regulation; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	compliance with any Law or Regulation or any applicable direction, request or requirement (whether or not having the force of law) of any Authority made after the date of this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	12.2
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Exceptions
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Company need not make any payment for an Increased Cost to the extent
	that the Increased Cost is:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	21
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage437"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	compensated for under another Clause or would have been but for an exception to that Clause;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	attributable to the implementation or application of or compliance with the &#147;International Convergence of Capital Measurement and Capital Standards, a Revised Framework&#148; published by the Basel Committee on
	Banking Supervision in June 2004 in the form existing on the date of this Agreement (but excluding any amendment arising out of Basel III) (
<B>
	Basel II
</B>
	) or any other law or regulation which implements Basel II (whether such implementation,
	application or compliance is by a government, regulator, the Lender or any of its Affiliates); or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	attributable to the Lender or any Affiliate of the Lender wilfully failing to comply with any Law or Regulation.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	12.3
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Claims
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	If the Lender intends to make a claim for an Increased Cost it must notify the Company of the circumstances giving rise to and the amount of the claim.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Lender must, as soon as practicable after making a demand, provide a certificate confirming the amount of its Increased Cost.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	13.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	MITIGATION
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	13.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Mitigation
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Lender must, in consultation with the Company, take all reasonable steps to mitigate any circumstances which arise and which result or would result in:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any Tax Payment or Increased Cost being payable to the Lender; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the Lender being able to exercise any right of prepayment and/or cancellation under this Agreement by reason of any illegality;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:13%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	including transferring its rights and obligations under the Finance Documents to an Affiliate or changing its Facility Office.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Paragraph (a) above does not in any way limit the obligations of the Company under the Finance Documents.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Company must promptly indemnify the Lender for all costs and expenses reasonably incurred by the Lender as a result of any step taken by it under this Subclause.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Lender is not obliged to take any step under this Subclause if, in the opinion of the Lender (acting reasonably), to do so might be prejudicial to it.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	13.2
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Conduct of business by the Lender
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	No term of any Finance Document will:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	22
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage438"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	interfere with the right of the Lender to arrange its affairs (Tax or otherwise) in whatever manner it thinks fit;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	oblige the Lender to investigate or claim any credit, relief, remission or repayment available to it in respect of Tax or the extent, order and manner of any claim; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	oblige the Lender to disclose any information relating to its affairs (Tax or otherwise) or any computation in respect of Tax.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	14.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	PAYMENTS
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	14.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Currency
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Unless a Finance Document specifies that payments under it are to be made in a different manner, the currency of each amount payable under the Finance Documents is determined under this Subclause.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Amounts payable in respect of Taxes, fees, costs and expenses are payable in the currency in which they are incurred.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Each other amount payable under the Finance Documents is payable in US Dollars.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	14.2
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	No set-off or counterclaim
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	All payments made by the Company under the Finance Documents
	must be calculated and made without (and free and clear of any deduction for) set-off or counterclaim.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	14.3
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Business Days
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	If a payment under the Finance Documents is due on a day which is not a Business Day, the due date for that payment will instead be the next Business Day in the same calendar month (if there is one) or the preceding
	Business Day (if there is not) or whatever day the Lender determines (acting reasonably) is market practice.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	During any extension of the due date for payment of any principal under this Agreement interest is payable on that principal at the rate payable on the original due date.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	14.4
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Disruption to payment systems
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If the Company receives a notification from the Lender
	that a Disruption Event has occurred or the Company notifies the Lender that a Disruption Event has occurred, the Lender may, and must if requested by the Company, enter into discussions with the Company for a period of not more than five days with
	a view to agreeing any changes to the operation or administration of the Facility as the Parties may decide are necessary, provided that the Lender is not obliged to agree to any changes if, in its reasonable opinion, it is not practicable to do so.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	23
</P>

<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">

	15.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	15.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Representations and warranties
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The representations and warranties set out in this
	Clause 15 are made by the Company to the Lender.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	15.2
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Status
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	It is a limited liability company, duly incorporated and validly existing under the laws of the Cayman Islands.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	It and each of its Subsidiaries has the power to own its assets and carry on its business as it is being conducted.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	It is acting as principal on its account and not as agent or trustee in any capacity on behalf of any party in relation to this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	It is not a FATCA FFI or a US Tax Obligor.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	15.3
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Powers and authority
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	It has the power to enter into and perform, and has taken all
	necessary action to authorise the entry into and performance of, the Finance Documents to which it is or will be a party and the transactions contemplated by those Finance Documents.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	15.4
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Legal validity
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Subject to any general principles of law limiting its obligations and referred to in any legal opinion required under this Agreement, each Finance Document to which it is a party is its legally binding, valid and
	enforceable obligation.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Each Finance Document to which it is a party is in the proper form for its enforcement in the jurisdiction of its incorporation and in Hong Kong.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</B>
</TD>

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The entry into and performance by it of, and the transactions contemplated
	by, the Finance Documents do not conflict with:

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

	delivered to the Lender (which, at the date of this Agreement, are the Original Financial Statements):

	of the Group has been started or, to its knowledge, threatened, which have or, if adversely determined, are reasonably likely to have a Material Adverse Effect.

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Issued share capital
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	It has a paid up share capital of not less than HKD1,000,000 or an
	equivalent amount in any other approved currency.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	For the purpose of this Subclause,
<B>
	approved currency
</B>
	means a currency which is
	freely convertible into Hong Kong Dollars or a currency approved in writing by the Registrar of Money Lenders appointed under section 4 of the Money Lenders Ordinance (Cap. 163, Laws of Hong Kong) (the
<B>
	MLO
</B>
	) for the purpose of paragraph 12 of
	Part 2 of Schedule 1 to the MLO.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</B>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	No member of the Group will:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	use (or otherwise make available) the proceeds of the Loan for the purpose of financing directly or indirectly the activities of any person or entity which is currently listed on the Specially Designated Nationals (the
<B>
	SDN
</B>
	) List or in a country which is subject to U.S. economic sanctions administered by the US Treasury Department Office of Foreign Assets Control (the
<B>
	OFAC Sanctions
</B>
	) to the extent such financing would be prohibited by the OFAC
	Sanctions if conducted by a person in the US; or
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">

	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	contribute or otherwise make available the proceeds of the Loan to any person or entity if the relevant member of the Group has actual knowledge that such party intends to use such proceeds for the purpose of financing
	the activities of any person or entity which is on the SDN List or in a country which is subject to the OFAC Sanctions, to the extent such financing would be prohibited by the OFAC Sanctions if conducted by a person in the US.
</TD>
</TR>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	None of the Company, any other member of the Group, any director, officer,
	employee, agent or Affiliate of the Company or any other member of the Group is, or is owned or controlled by any person(s) that is:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

<B>
	15.13
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Anti-corruption
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	No member of the Group nor its directors or officers or (to the best of
	the Company&#146;s knowledge having made all reasonable enquiries) its agents or employees or any other persons acting for it or on its behalf (each a
<B>
	Relevant Person
</B>
	) have:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	violated (and will violate) any applicable anti-bribery or anti-corruption laws;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	offered, paid, promised to pay or authorised the payment of (and will offer, pay, promise to pay or authorise the payment of) any money; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	offered, given, promised to give or authorised the giving of (and will offer, give, promise to give or authorise the giving of) anything of value to any Government Official (
<B>
	Government Official
</B>
	means any officer,
	employee or any other person acting in an official capacity for any government authority or any political party or any candidate for political office (both individually and collectively)) or to any person,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	under circumstances where any member of the Group or the Relevant Person knew or was aware of a high probability that all or a portion of such
	money or thing of value would be offered, given or promised, directly or indirectly, to any Government Official, in each case for the purpose of:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	i.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any unlawful contribution, gift, entertainment or other unlawful expense relating to political activity;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	ii.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	influencing any act or decision of such Government Official in his official capacity (including a decision to fail to perform his official function);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	iii.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	inducing such Government Official to do any act in relation to his lawful duty;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	iv.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	securing any improper advantage;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	26
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage442"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	v.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	inducing such Government Official to influence or affect any act or decision of any Government Entity
<B>
	(Government Entity
</B>
	means government or any department, agency or instrumentality thereof, including any entity
	or enterprise owned or controlled by a government, or a public international organisation); or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	vi.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	assisting any member of the Group or the Relevant Person in obtaining or retaining business for or with a Government Entity, or directing business to the Group or the Relevant Person (and such conduct a
<B>
	Corrupt
	Activity
</B>
	),
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	provided that the Company shall not be in breach of the representation in this Clause 15.13 if, within thirty
	(30) days of becoming aware of any Corrupt Activity, the Company takes appropriate action to remedy such Corrupt Activity.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</B>
</TD>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Company must ensure that each set of financial statements supplied under this Agreement is prepared using GAAP and gives (if audited) a true and fair view of, or (if unaudited) fairly represents, its financial
	condition (consolidated or otherwise) as at the date to which those financial statements were drawn up.
</TD>
</TR>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a full description of any change notified under paragraph (b) above;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	sufficient information to enable the Lender to make a proper comparison between the financial position shown by the set of financial statements prepared on the changed basis and its most recent consolidated financial
	statements delivered to the Lender under this Agreement; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	sufficient information, in form and substance as may be reasonably required by the Lender, to enable the Lender to determine whether Clause 17 (Financial covenants) has been complied with and make an accurate comparison
	between the financial position indicated in those financial statements and the Original Financial Statements.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	16.3
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Compliance Certificate
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Company must supply to the Lender a Compliance Certificate with each set of its financial statements sent to the Lender under this Agreement.
</TD>

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;

	16.4
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Information - miscellaneous
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

	The Company must, subject to paragraph (b) below, supply to the Lender:
</TD>
</TR>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

	(i)
</TD>

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

</TD>

	could reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	promptly on request, a list of the then current Restricted Subsidiaries;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

</TD>

	promptly on request, such further information regarding the financial condition, business and operations of any member of the Group as the Lender may reasonably request; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	29
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage445"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(v)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	promptly, notice of any change in authorised signatories of the Company signed by a director or company secretary of the Company accompanied by specimen signatures of any new authorised signatories.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Nothing in paragraph (a) above shall require the Company to supply any document or information to the Lender if and for so long such disclosure will cause the Company to be in breach of the relevant listing rules of
	NASDAQ or any mandatory provisions of applicable laws or any confidentiality agreements or undertakings.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	16.5
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Notification of Default
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Company must notify the Lender of any Default (and the steps, if any, being taken to remedy it) promptly upon becoming aware of its occurrence.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Promptly on request by the Lender, the Company must supply to the Lender a certificate, signed by two of its authorised signatories on its behalf, certifying that no Default is outstanding or, if a Default is
	outstanding, specifying the Default and the steps, if any, being taken to remedy it.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	16.6
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Year end
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Company must not change its financial year end except with the prior
	written consent of the Lender (which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	17.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	FINANCIAL COVENANTS
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	17.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Definitions
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In this Clause 17:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Adjusted Consolidated EBITDA
</B>
	means, in relation to a Measurement Period, Consolidated EBITDA for the period adjusted by:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	including the operating profit before interest, tax, depreciation, amortisation and impairment charges (EBITDA) of a member of the Group or attributable to a business or assets acquired during the Measurement Period for
	that part of the Measurement Period when it was not a member of the Group and/or the business or assets were not owned by a member of the Group; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	excluding the EBITDA attributable to any member of the Group or to any business or assets sold during that Measurement Period.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Consolidated Cash Balance
</B>
	means, at any time, the aggregate of all cash and cash equivalents and short-term investments held by the
	Group at that time which would be included on a consolidated balance sheet of the Group drawn up at that time in accordance with GAAP as &#147;Cash and cash equivalents&#148; or &#147;Short-term investments&#148; and for so long as repayment of that
	cash or realisation of those cash equivalents or short-term investments is not contingent on the prior discharge of any other indebtedness of any member of the Group or of any other person whatsoever or on satisfaction of any other condition outside
	the control of the Group.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	30
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage446"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Consolidated EBIT
</B>
	means, in relation to a Measurement Period, the aggregate of:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the consolidated operating profits of the Group (including the results from discontinued operations) before finance costs and tax for that Measurement Period;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	plus or minus the Group&#146;s share of the profits or losses of associates for that period (after finance costs and tax) and the Group&#146;s share of the profits or losses of any joint ventures;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	adjusted by:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	taking no account of any Exceptional Item;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	taking no account of any unrealised gains or losses on any derivative instrument or other financial instrument (other than any derivative instrument which is accounted for on a hedge accounting basis) which is reported
	through the income statement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	taking no account of any income or charge attributable to a post-employment benefit scheme other than the current service costs and any past service costs and curtailments and settlements attributable to the scheme;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	taking no account of any expense referable to equity-settled share-based compensation of employees.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Consolidated EBITDA
</B>
	means, in relation to a Measurement Period, Consolidated EBIT for that Measurement Period after adding back any
	depreciation and amortisation and taking no account of any charge for impairment or any reversal of any previous impairment charge made in the period.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Consolidated Tangible Net Worth
</B>
	means at any time the aggregate of:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the amount paid up or credited as paid up on the issued share capital of the Company; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the net amount standing to the credit (or debit) of the consolidated reserves of the Company,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	based on the latest published audited or unaudited consolidated balance sheet of the Company (the
<B>
	latest balance sheet
</B>
	) (and in each
	case, the balance sheet of the Company to be provided by the Company as at 31&nbsp;December of each year shall always be audited) but adjusted by:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	deducting any dividend or other distribution proposed, declared or made by the Company (except to the extent it has been taken into account in the latest balance sheet);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	deducting any amount attributable to goodwill or any other intangible asset;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	31
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage447"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	deducting any amount attributable to an upward revaluation of assets (other than financial instruments) after 31&nbsp;December 2014 or, in the case of assets of a company which becomes a member of the Group after that
	date, the date on which that company becomes a member of the Group;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	reflecting any variation in the amount of the issued share capital of the Company after the date of the latest balance sheet (and any change in the consolidated reserves of the Group resulting from that variation); and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(v)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	excluding any amounts debited or credited to deferred tax which relates to the revaluation of any item which is excluded from the calculation.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Consolidated Total Borrowings
</B>
	means, in respect of the Group, at any time, the aggregate of the following liabilities calculated at the
	nominal, principal or other amount at which the liabilities would be carried in a consolidated balance sheet of the Company drawn up at that time (or in the case of any guarantee, indemnity or similar assurance referred to in paragraph (i) below,
	the maximum liability under the relevant instrument):
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any moneys borrowed;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any redeemable preference shares;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any acceptance under any acceptance credit (including any dematerialised equivalent);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any bond, note, debenture, loan stock or other similar instrument;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">

</TD>

	any indebtedness under a finance or capital lease in accordance with the GAAP;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

</TD>

	(h)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any indebtedness arising in connection with any other transaction (including any forward sale or purchase agreement) which has the commercial effect of a borrowing; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any indebtedness of any person of a type referred to in the above paragraphs which is the subject of a guarantee, indemnity or similar assurance against financial loss given by a member of the Group,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	in each case, for the avoidance of doubt, excluding any indebtedness arising (a) in the ordinary course of trading (other than, for the
	avoidance of doubt, any indebtedness or borrowed moneys incurred to finance the relevant trade) and (b) between members of the Group.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;

<B>
	Exceptional Item
</B>
	means any material item of income or expense that represents:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any gain or loss arising from:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	write-downs of inventories to net realisable value or of property, plant and equipment to recoverable amount, and reversals of such write-downs;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	restructuring the activities of the Group or any member of the Group and any reversals of any provision for the costs of restructuring;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

</TD>

</TABLE>

	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

</TD>
